content.text:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Enforcing Administration Policies and Rules for Students

1. Familiarize yourself with policies
   - Carefully review school handbook and policy documents
   - Attend staff meetings on policy updates and changes
   - Ask administrators for clarification when needed

2. Communicate rules clearly to students
   - Review key policies at the start of the year
   - Post classroom rules visibly
   - Remind students of expectations regularly

3. Be consistent in enforcement
   - Apply rules fairly to all students
   - Follow through on stated consequences
   - Document policy violations

4. Use positive reinforcement
   - Recognize students following rules
   - Implement reward systems for good behavior
   - Model expected conduct

5. Address violations promptly
   - Speak privately with student about infraction
   - Explain which rule was broken and why it matters
   - Assign appropriate consequence per policy

6. Involve administration when necessary
   - Report serious violations to principal
   - Seek support for recurring issues
   - Participate in disciplinary meetings as needed

7. Communicate with parents
   - Inform parents of policy violations
   - Explain consequences given
   - Seek parental support in reinforcing rules

8. Reflect and adjust approach as needed
   - Evaluate effectiveness of enforcement strategies
   - Seek feedback from colleagues and administrators
   - Modify techniques to improve student compliance

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
